matomoR 0.0.1
  • Reference

matomoR query function

Source: R/matomo_package_query.R
matomo_package_query.Rd

This is an internal function of the matomoR package to query the api.

matomo_package_query(url = NULL, query = NULL)

Arguments

url

The URL for the api call.
query

A list of query parameters.

Value

The response of the api call.

Examples

Sys.setenv(MATOMO_HOST = "https://demo.matomo.org")
Sys.setenv(MATOMO_TOKEN = "anonymous")

# Construct the query
query <- list(
 module = "API",
 method = "API.getMatomoVersion"
)

# Create the url
url <- httr::modify_url(matomo_hostname(), query = query)

# Make the query
matomo_package_query(url)
#> $content
#> $content$value
#> [1] "3.12.0-rc3"
#> 
#> 
#> $url
#> [1] "https://demo.matomo.org/index.php?module=API&method=API.getMatomoVersion"
#> 
#> $response
#> Response [https://demo.matomo.org/index.php?module=API&method=API.getMatomoVersion&format=JSON&token_auth=anonymous]
#>   Date: 2019-11-13 13:30
#>   Status: 200
#>   Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
#>   Size: 22 B
#> 
#> 
#> attr(,"class")
#> [1] "matomo_api"
